title: Smart Budget Tracker
description: A web app that helps users manage their expenses and savings with real-time charts and budget recommendations.

title: Recipe Finder App
description: A mobile-friendly application to discover new recipes based on ingredients you already have at home.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A sleek and responsive portfolio site showcasing creative and development projects with contact integration.

title: TaskMate - Productivity App
description: A full-stack to-do list app with user authentication, reminders, and drag-and-drop task management.

title: Travel Blog CMS
description: A custom content management system for travel bloggers with rich text editor and photo gallery support.

title: E-Commerce Storefront
description: A modern e-commerce site built with MERN stack featuring product filtering, cart, and payment integration.
